sentences.english: His arms were tied together behind his back .
sentences.chinese: 他的胳臂被反绑在背后。

sentences.english: Her arm was mutilated in the accident.
sentences.chinese: 她的一只胳臂在事故中伤残了。

sentences.english: She prepared to undo the band of cloth around his arm which had served as tourniquet.
sentences.chinese: 她准备解开缠在他胳臂上止血的布带。

sentences.english: Scarlett’s hand fell from his arm.
sentences.chinese: 思嘉的手从他的胳臂上滑下来。

sentences.english: His feeble arm dropped powerless down.
sentences.chinese: 他那软弱的胳臂没力气地放了下来。

sentences.english: I snatched it away, however, and seized his arm.
sentences.chinese: 但是我把蜡烛夺过来，抓住他的胳臂。

sentences.english: He unlocked his grip on my arm.
sentences.chinese: 他把紧攥着我的胳臂的手松开。

sentences.english: The child tugged at my arm to attract my attention.
sentences.chinese: 那孩子拉我的胳臂以能上能下引起我的注意。

sentences.english: Much of the skin on her arm was abraded.
sentences.chinese: 她胳臂上的大片皮肤被擦破了。

sentences.english: He swept all glasses on the table with one of his arm.
sentences.chinese: 他用胳臂把桌上的玻璃杯一下子胡噜到了地上。

sentences.english: Her elbows were resting on the table.
sentences.chinese: 她的胳臂肘支在桌子上。

sentences.english: Her arms ached from swinging the wide palmetto leaf.
sentences.chinese: 她用力挥着那把大棕榈扇，胳臂都酸痛了。

sentences.english: His feeble arm dropped powerlessly down.
sentences.chinese: 他那软弱的胳臂没力气地放了下来。

sentences.english: She received his blows with her arms.
sentences.chinese: 她用胳臂挡住他的殴打。

sentences.english: Mind you, don't catch that cup with your elbow.
sentences.chinese: 留神你的胳臂肘别刮掉了那只茶杯。
